dam.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a special wall built across a river or stream to stop the water from flowing, especially in order to make a lake or produce electricity
dam.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: the mother of a four-legged animal, especially a horse
dam.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to stop the water in a river or stream from flowing by building a special wall across it
dam.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to stop something from being expressed or continuing
dam.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: Once she allowed her anger to show, it could not be dammed up again.
